Text.Page:
You'd think pirates would stick to the seas, where they belong. But no, they've infested the jungle, too.

And I don't want to get abducted, or worse. You're not exactly a kidnap risk, though. Can you locate some golden pigweed from west or south of here, and gather pigweed petals for me? I need it to make medicine.

Heck, maybe medicine to heal you someday.

Ah, pigweed petals. "Balm of the seas," we used to call it. Not that you found it at sea, mind you. But we pirates take it with us on every voyage.

Or at least we pirates did. No proper pirates left, of course...just flotsam and jetsam like me. The nagas wiped us all out.

Sorry, the ramblin' is a bad habit. Bring me more pigweed petals if you think of it, eh, ?
Shame if you bled to death because the closest thing to a physician in this village has no pigweed petals, eh?
